mapper.select: SELECT V.PD_ID AS PD_ID, V.PD_TITLE AS PD_TITLE, V.PRICE AS PRICE, V.DISTANCE AS DISTANCE, V.PD_PHOTO AS PD_PHOTO FROM ( SELECT PD_ID, PD_NAME, PRICE, PD_PHOTO, PD_TITLE , ROUND(DISTANCE_WGS84(LAT, LON, #{lat}, #{lon}), 2) AS DISTANCE FROM DIRE_PD_NEAR_VIEW ) V ORDER BY V.DISTANCE
SELECT PD_ID, PD_TITLE, PRICE, PD_REGIT_DATE, PD_PHOTO FROM DELI_PD_LIST_REALVIEW
SELECT PD_CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY

SELECT PD_ID, PD_TITLE, PD_NAME, PD_PHOTO, PD_AS_REMAIN, PD_HITCOUNT, PRICE , SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(PD_HOPE_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, 10) AS PD_HOPE_SDATE, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(PD_HOPE_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, 10) AS PD_HOPE_EDATE , PD_HOPE_STIME, PD_HOPE_ETIME, PD_HOPE_PLACE , PD_REGIT_DATE, PD_MAKER_ID, PD_AS_ID, PD_AS_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, SELLER , U_NICKNAME, MAKER_NAME, MAKER_NAME2, CF_PRICE, COMMENTS , PD_HOPE_EDATE + ROUND(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PD_HOPE_ETIME, 1, 2)-4)/24, 10) AS REMAIN_DATE , PROFILE FROM DIRE_PD_LIST_REALVIEW WHERE PD_ID = #{pd_id}

SELECT PD_ID, PD_TITLE, PD_NAME, PD_PHOTO, PD_AS_REMAIN, PD_HITCOUNT, PRICE , PD_REGIT_DATE, PD_MAKER_ID, PD_AS_ID, PD_AS_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, SELLER , U_NICKNAME, MAKER_NAME, MAKER_NAME2, CF_PRICE, COMMENTS, IMDPRICE, (PD_REGIT_DATE+5) AS REMAIN_DATE , PROFILE FROM DELI_PD_LIST_REALVIEW WHERE PD_ID = #{pd_id}
SELECT ROUND(REMAIN_DATE-SYSDATE) AS END_DATE FROM ( SELECT (PD_REGIT_DATE+5) AS REMAIN_DATE FROM DELI_PD_LIST_REALVIEW WHERE PD_ID = #{pd_id} )

SELECT PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, PD_PRICE, SYSTEM, COMP_DATE, SELLER_ID, BUYER_ID, STATUS, PD_PHOTO FROM PRODUCT_LIST_VIEW2 WHERE BLIND = 'NOT' AND PD_TITLE LIKE #{searchKey} ORDER BY COMP_DATE DESC , STATUS DESC

SELECT PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, PD_PRICE, SYSTEM, COMP_DATE, SELLER_ID, BUYER_ID, STATUS, PD_PHOTO FROM PRODUCT_LIST_VIEW2 WHERE BLIND = 'NOT' AND PD_TITLE LIKE #{searchKey} ORDER BY COMP_DATE DESC , STATUS DESC , PD_PRICE DESC

SELECT PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, PD_PRICE, SYSTEM, COMP_DATE, SELLER_ID, BUYER_ID, STATUS, PD_PHOTO FROM PRODUCT_LIST_VIEW2 WHERE BLIND = 'NOT' AND PD_TITLE LIKE #{searchKey} ORDER BY COMP_DATE DESC , STATUS DESC , PD_PRICE ASC

SELECT PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, PD_PRICE, SYSTEM, COMP_DATE, SELLER_ID, BUYER_ID, STATUS, PD_PHOTO FROM PRODUCT_LIST_VIEW2 WHERE BLIND = 'NOT' AND PD_TITLE LIKE #{searchKey} AND SYSTEM = '직거래(제안거래)' ORDER BY COMP_DATE DESC , STATUS DESC

SELECT PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, PD_PRICE, SYSTEM, COMP_DATE, SELLER_ID, BUYER_ID, STATUS, PD_PHOTO FROM PRODUCT_LIST_VIEW2 WHERE BLIND = 'NOT' AND PD_TITLE LIKE #{searchKey} AND SYSTEM = '택배(경매)' ORDER BY COMP_DATE DESC , STATUS DESC

SELECT PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, PD_PRICE, SYSTEM, COMP_DATE, SELLER_ID, BUYER_ID, STATUS, PD_PHOTO FROM PRODUCT_LIST_VIEW2 WHERE BLIND = 'NOT' AND CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName} ORDER BY COMP_DATE DESC , STATUS DESC
SELECT BID_CODE, U_NICKNAME, PRICE, BID_DATE, ADDRESS, PROFILE FROM BID_LIST_REALVIEW WHERE DELI_PD_ID = #{pd_id} ORDER BY PRICE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS BUY_COUNT FROM BID_SUCCESS BS JOIN BID_LIST BL ON BS.BID_CODE = BL.BID_CODE WHERE BL.DELI_PD_ID = #{pd_id}
SELECT CASE TRUNC(SQRT((SUM(USER_EXP))/2)) WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE TRUNC(SQRT((SUM(USER_EXP))/2)) END AS USER_LEVEL FROM USER_LEVEL_VIEW2 WHERE U_ID = #{u_id}
SELECT PD_ID, PD_TITLE, PRICE, PD_PHOTO FROM PD_LIST_MAIN_VIEW ORDER BY PD_REGIT_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELECTED(SELECTED_ID, BUYER_CODE, SELLER_CODE, SUGGEST_CODE) VALUES(CONCAT('sel_',TO_CHAR(SELECTED_SEQ.NEXTVAL+1)) , CONCAT(DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('X', 8), DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('U', 8)) , CONCAT(DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('X', 8), DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('L', 8)) , #{suggest_code})
INSERT INTO DELI_COMPLETE_BUY(DELI_COMP_BUY_ID, REVIEW, BS_ID) VALUES(CONCAT('dcbuy_', DELI_COMPLETE_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{review}, #{bs_id})
INSERT INTO DELI_COMPLETE_SELL(DELI_COMP_SELL_ID, PD_DELI_NUM, REVIEW, BS_ID) VALUES(CONCAT('dcsell_', DELI_COMPLETE_SELL_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{deli_num}, #{review}, #{bs_id})
INSERT INTO BID_SUCCESS(BS_ID, BID_CODE) VALUES(CONCAT('bs_', BS_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{bid_code})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS BS_COUNT FROM BID_SUCCESS BS JOIN BID_LIST BL ON BS.BID_CODE = BL.BID_CODE WHERE BL.DELI_PD_ID = #{pd_id} AND BL.U_ID = #{u_id}
SELECT BL.BID_PRICE AS FINAL_PRICE FROM BID_SUCCESS BS JOIN BID_LIST BL ON BS.BID_CODE = BL.BID_CODE WHERE BL.DELI_PD_ID = #{pd_id}
SELECT B.BID_PRICE AS NOW_PRICE FROM ( SELECT BID_PRICE, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY BID_PRICE DESC) AS RANK FROM BID_LIST WHERE DELI_PD_ID = #{pd_id} )B WHERE B.RANK = 1
